body: Hello Guys, I'm testing a sort of benchmark room to which I will compare the actual project that I'm wotking on. I'm doing a DLA analysis.  And I want to understand why the add glazing based on ratio component gives me 2 separated windows (refer to image), I really need to work with one window pane.   Also I will like to change the occupancy file from 9-5 to 8-6. How can this be done   Thank you all   [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/SRbpV0Al75qYSd0Z9*4mrtx4whKKz6Iy6vt7VyRXoqtas5q9pfbTaZ4-tYqTzhYDRY1yzFQ7-vD8fiXFpBAec*gtLt6ujUUt/Canvasat131628.png)
topic: HoneyBee Add glazing Ratio and occupancy period components
